comments.html: This is as helpful as "the network is down :(" What do you (as a network engineer) expect me to do with such a problem report?
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: My account doesnt have free subscription so I cant access those videos, and unable to apply for free subscription type now as well. Appreciate your suggestion if there is solution for this, Sir
comments.name: Hung Nguyen

comments.html:
One of the links in the blog post pointed to a page that could confuse you. Hope I removed that source of confusion ("access content" on that page now sends you straight to the videos).

Also, please make sure you are not logged in when trying to access the videos (will fix that one as well).
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
